Package com.opengamma.strata.measure.fxopt

Class BlackFxOptionSmileVolatilitiesSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.measure.fxopt.BlackFxOptionSmileVolatilitiesSpecification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FxOptionVolatilitiesSpecification, java.io.Serializable, Bean, ImmutableBean
    public final class BlackFxOptionSmileVolatilitiesSpecification
extends java.lang.Object
implements FxOptionVolatilitiesSpecification, ImmutableBean, java.io.Serializable
    The specification of how to build FX option volatilities.

    This is the specification for a single volatility object, BlackFxOptionSmileVolatilities.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
